code: export var REGAIN_MANA='REGAIN_MANA';export var BEGIN='BEGIN';export var SET_GAMER_NAME='SET_GAMER_NAME';export var END='END';export var ATTACK='ATTACK';export var FIRE_BALL='FIRE_BALL';export var FIRE_CONE='FIRE_CONE';export var ICE='ICE';export var HEAL='HEAL';export var LOST_MANA='LOST_MANA';export var CHANGE_LEVEL='CHANGE_LEVEL';export var CHANGE_DISPLAY_ANIMATION='CHANGE_DISPLAY_ANIMATION';export var REPORT_BATTLE='REPORT_BATTLE';export var regainMana=function regainMana(){return{type:REGAIN_MANA};};export var begin=function begin(){return{type:BEGIN};};export var setGamerName=function setGamerName(value){return{type:SET_GAMER_NAME,value:value};};export var end=function end(){return{type:END};};export var attack=function attack(attacker){return{type:ATTACK,attacker:attacker};};export var fireBall=function fireBall(attacker){return{type:FIRE_BALL,attacker:attacker};};export var fireCone=function fireCone(){return{type:FIRE_CONE};};export var ice=function ice(attacker){return{type:ICE,attacker:attacker};};export var heal=function heal(value){return{type:HEAL,value:value};};export var lostMana=function lostMana(value,number){return{type:LOST_MANA,value:value,number:number};};export var changeLevel=function changeLevel(){return{type:CHANGE_LEVEL};};export var changeDisplayAnimation=function changeDisplayAnimation(){return{type:CHANGE_DISPLAY_ANIMATION};};export var reportBattle=function reportBattle(forWho){return{type:REPORT_BATTLE,forWho:forWho};};
